content: धूम्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धूमं तद्वर्णं राति रा-क] {@--1@} Smoke-coloured, smoky, grey; <ls>Bh. 3. 55</ls>; <ls>R. 15. 16.</ls> {@--2@} Dark-red. {@--3@} Dark, obscured. {@--4@} Purple. --म्रः {@--1@} A mixture of red and black. {@--2@} Incense. {@--3@} Purple (the colour). {@--4@} An epithet of Śiva. --म्रा An epithet of Durgā. --म्रं Sin, vice, wickedness.
